thread.title: Capture Exceptional Memories in the City of Angels with la moments packages at four seasons hotel LOs AngelesTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Capture Exceptional Memories in the City of Angels with la moments packages at four seasons hotel LOs AngelesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Four Seasons LA partners with Flytographer to offer a local feel to guests Published on : Friday, July 17, 2015
Four Seasons Hotel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills has partnered with travel photography service Flytographer to launch two packages to create and capture extraordinary lasting memories for guests, as part of the Suite Hotel California Experience, which is available from September 1 through November 30, 2015. The Suite Hotel California Coastal Tour with Four Seasons is a select grouping of the brand’s seven luxurious properties situated across famed locations in the Golden State. Four Seasons hotels in California are teaming up to bring guests the ultimate road-trip featuring exclusive local experiences that highlight the best of California’s coastal destinations where Four Seasons calls home.
The Suite Hotel California – LA Moments and Iconic LA Moments packages will connect guests with an expert Flytographer to capture vacation memories in style at famous Hollywood movie locations around the city. The packages are especially ideal for guests celebrating a honeymoon, international travellers, single travellers, families and other leisure guests.
Flytographer shoots are fun, candid vacation photo sessions that make the ideal souvenir and ultimate travel experience. Flytographers are professional photographers that capture special vacation memories and also serve as unofficial “tour guides” to give insider tips to travellers. Flytographers will capture the authentic experience of exploring Los Angeles and the glamour of Old Hollywood. Locations for these packages can include Greystone Mansion, used in Ghostbusters, The Witches of Eastwick, The Fabulous Baker Boys, The Bodyguard and more; Rodeo Drive, used in Pretty Woman; Griffith Park Observatory, the location used in Rebel Without a Cause and The Terminator; Universal Studios, the studio for Psycho, Back to the Future, the original black and white Frankenstein, Wolfman and Dracula; Union Station, an art deco time capsule from the 1930s; or other legendary locations.
Source:-Four Seasons
